categories: Category:Personnel of Ysanne Isard's Thyferran regime

nodes.text: Ardle was a male Human who served as a captain and TIE fighter pilot for the Thyferran Home Defense Corps. Ardle and his squadron fought against former members of the New Republic starfighter squadron Rogue Squadron, at the Graveyard. After the Victory-class Star Destroyer Corrupter was destroyed, Ardle and the remaining TIE's surrendered to Wedge Antilles, the leader of the former Rogues.
